name: Reversible Tote in Raspberry Chocolate/Birds
description:
About the Item
This cotton-blend tote bag is a simple and versatile design. It has two contrasting fabrics so you can switch sides to go with different outfits, seasons, and moods.

Perfect for
-everyday use
-books
-laptop
-knitting or crafting supplies
-gifts

Measurements
(size reference shown in third photo)
-Approx. 13.5in or 34.5cm tall
-Approx. 10.5in or 27cm across
-Approx. 1.5in or 4cm across shoulder straps
-Approx. 21.5in or 55cm length of shoulder straps

Colors
Side one: Magenta with dark brown branches
Side two: Multicolored birds, polka dots, branches, checkers and stripes in white, yellow, green, pink, blue, brown, and red.

Care Instructions
Machine wash cold on delicate cycle, tumble dry low

Shipping
-$2 U.S. Shipping
-$4 International Shipping
Handmade items are made to order.  Please allow up to one week before your item is shipped.  U.S. purchases are sent via USPS first class with delivery confirmation – shipping may take 2-5 days.  International orders may take at least one week.  If you need rush shipping please contact me at wattlebirddesigns (at) gmail (dot) com before placing your order. 

About Wattlebird
Wattlebird is an independent online boutique that sells handmade accessories, upcycled clothing, vintage home goods, and everything in between.  All items are made and stored with care in my smoke-free home in Michigan.  To learn more, please visit www.wattlebirdblog.com.

name: Knitter's Tote Bag
description:
About the Item
This canvas tote is perfect for knitters. It has lots of room in the main section, and a large pocket on the outside. There are three balls of yarn (made of felt) just above the outside pocket. They are bright blue, pink, and green. And there is also a dark purple pair of knitting needles (also made of felt).

Perfect for
-knitting or craft supplies
-diaper bag
-laptop
-everyday purse

Measurements
approx. 18in x 18 in or 46cm x 46cm

Colors
This product is currently only available in one color

Care Instructions
Hand wash, lay flat to dry

Shipping
-$2 U.S. Shipping
-$4 International Shipping

name: Houndstooth Felt Pouch
description:
About the Item
This hand-stitched pouch is made from houndstooth patterned felt. It is black and white with a colorful flag embellishment and a vintage black button.

Perfect for
-sunglass case
-storing coupons
-purse organization
-camera/cell phone/ipod cozy

Measurements
approx. 6in x 4in or 15cm x 10 cm

Colors
The pouch itself is black and white. The flag embellishment is currently available in four colors:
-yellow
-teal
-hot pink
-olive green
Please specify your color choice when making your purchase

Care Instructions
Spot clean/hand wash cold

Shipping
-$2 U.S. Shipping
